direct_enhancements.method_name: printHelp(PrintWriter, int, String, String, Options, int, int, String)
direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods print help information to a PrintWriter, but printHelp provides more detailed options and formatting.
Both methods handle the formatting and appending of option-related information to a StringBuilder or PrintWriter.
Both methods involve text wrapping and appending to an Appendable object, handling line breaks and padding.
Both methods print wrapped text to a PrintWriter, handling line breaks and padding similarly.
Both methods print option-related information to a PrintWriter, with printOptions focusing on detailed option descriptions.
